name: expressionistic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
using, relating to, or similar to expressionism (= a style of art, music, or writing, beginning in the 1900s, that tries to express people's feelings and emotions): The director has created a sinister atmosphere by means of expressionistic lighting. Germany was the centre of this expressionistic style of cinema. The new style of dance that he developed was increasingly expressionistic. Compare
expressionistRelated word
expressionism
More examplesFewer examplesHe established himself as an expressionistic painter.The director has taken an expressionistic approach to the play.The painting is very expressionistic, with its wild brush strokes and extreme colours.One wall of her studio is covered with expressionistic portraits.
